document_data.name: Vodos
document_data.mainbody: '''Vodos''' was the great [[triton]] [[architect]] who planned the [[Sharksbane Wall]].
document_data.History:
Vodos was a very ancient triton born possibly in {{Yearlink|-11000}}. He was old at the time of the rise of [[Aryselmalyr]]. A devout priest of [[Persana]], under his god's inspiration, he erected the early garrisons of the [[Sharksteeth Mounts]] and planned and possibly built the Sharksbane Wall.

Vodos's death was surrounded by mystery. In {{Yearlink|-10400}}, when very old, he went into the [[Trench of Lopok]] and nobody saw him again. Many believed he had chosen Lopok as his resting place but this was only speculation.
